Package io.servicetalk.http.api

Interface HttpProviders.HttpServerBuilderProvider

Enclosing class:
HttpProviders
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public static interface HttpProviders.HttpServerBuilderProvider
Provider for HttpServerBuilder.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    HttpServerBuilder
    newBuilder(SocketAddress address, HttpServerBuilder builder)
    Returns a HttpServerBuilder based on the address and pre-initialized HttpServerBuilder.

  • Method Details

    • newBuilder

      HttpServerBuilder newBuilder(SocketAddress address, HttpServerBuilder builder)
      Returns a HttpServerBuilder based on the address and pre-initialized HttpServerBuilder.

      This method may return the pre-initialized builder as-is, or apply custom builder settings before returning it, or wrap it (DelegatingHttpServerBuilder may be helpful).

      Parameters:
      address - a server address used to create a HttpServerBuilder
      builder - pre-initialized HttpServerBuilder
      Returns:
      a HttpServerBuilder based on the address and pre-initializedHttpServerBuilder.
      See Also:
      • DelegatingHttpServerBuilder
